title: Do you even understand how terrifying life would be if Pokemon were real?
body:
Can you imagine if people like Kim Jong Un or ISIS got ahold of some real strong Pokemon? Holy shit, man.. Although ISIS would probably only use Pokemon like Electrode and Golem since they can use Explosion, but Kim Jong Un would probably get some really powerful legendaries and shit and send them at us.

Everyone likes to think living in the Pokemon world would be amazing, and it might be, but if Pokemon lived in OUR world, we'd be fucked. We hate each other too much.
